NBi a framework to test your Business Intelligence solutions.

Just plain xml

No need of C#, Java or any other development language to test your BI Solution. Your tests are written in xml by the means of a useful and intuitive syntax.

How NBi works →

All your components

NBi helps you to create tests targeting your databases, cubes, etls and reports with a unique framework.

List of features →

Automate generation

NBi is shipped with a tool to facilitate the automation of creation of test-cases. Build hundreds tests in a couple of minutes.

Genbi →

Compare two query results

<test name="Compare two query results">

  <system-under-test>

    <execution>

      <query>

        select * from FirstTable;

      </query>

    </execution>

  </system-under-test>

  <assert>

    <equalTo>

      <query>

        select * from SecondTable;

      </query>

    </equalTo>

  </assert>

</test>

Express your testing intentions.
